data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/dlV7bKBmPWS3dduheSsGon22hgX.jpg","id":54154,"title":"The 5th Day of Peace","original_title":"Dio è con noi","overview":"Based on a true story. Near the end of World War II, two German deserters are put in an Allied POW camp. When a rigid and militaristic German colonel learns about their desertion, he wants them court-martialed, even if the war is over. The uninterested Allied officers oblige him, and the two men face the firing squad on \"the fifth day of peace\".","poster_path":"/xc0CVpp4Bkk0NY1XSMn7he6t1AS.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[18,10752],"popularity":4.614,"release_date":"1970-04-17","video":false,"vote_average":5.4,"vote_count":18},{"backdrop_path":"/v5k7ek69SKPH2r7BNzZhn5GyB9i.jpg","id":11612,"title":"Even Angels Eat Beans","original_title":"Anche gli angeli mangiano fagioli","overview":"Two mismatched buddies are mistaken for mob enforcers in Depression-era America.","poster_path":"/hEeC0pFHZ4gK13czO0BJHwDpdzI.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[80,28,35],"popularity":15.148,"release_date":"1973-03-22","video":false,"vote_average":6.4,"vote_count":207},{"backdrop_path":"/7JBSw3lxNUmlfztAHGiAs7slZkC.jpg","id":46445,"title":"Buddy Goes West","original_title":"Occhio alla penna","overview":"Trinity series star Bud Spencer returns to the Wild West in director Michele Lupo's comic tale of an outlaw drifter, Buddy, who is mistaken for a doctor after his Indian companion inadvertently steals a bag of surgical instruments. When a band of murderous outlaws attempts to overrun the small town Buddy is passing through, the presumed medico shows that his true talent is cracking skulls. Music is composed by Ennio Morricone.","poster_path":"/fslVCyATK3Tzt7axYPRHQ9yCXhQ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[28,37,35],"popularity":8.432,"release_date":"1981-05-14","video":false,"vote_average":6.135,"vote_count":115},{"backdrop_path":"/vAFtmTIaOWu7T7iIdXpDtQl9XVO.jpg","id":11340,"title":"Banana Joe","original_title":"Banana Joe","overview":"Island farmer Banana Joe helps the local community by trading his bananas for goods. When gangsters arrive with plans to construct a banana processing plant, Joe kicks them out, but the mob boss discovers that Joe is operating without a license. A gunslinger learns about it and decides he wants the money for himself and so hatches an elaborate plot to get at it. He lures the crook into a rigged poker game, and afterward a gunfight ensues. The quick-drawing gunman makes short work of the robber, then teams up with an insurance agent to look for the hidden fortune. Unbeknownst to them, the robber had an ace up his sleeve...","poster_path":"/mEhoHmnwxpGeLdSOfqJHFGmcWqv.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[37],"popularity":18.142,"release_date":"1967-10-31","video":false,"vote_average":6.588,"vote_count":244},{"backdrop_path":"/p1rU5RalhYCTDpasCFTwhKp795J.jpg","id":11972,"title":"The Little World of Don Camillo","original_title":"Don Camillo","overview":"In a village of the Po valley where the earth is hard and life miserly, the priest and the communist mayor are always fighting to be the head of the community. If in secret, they admired and liked each other, politics still divided them as it is dividing the country. And when the mayor wants his \"People's House\"; the priest wants his \"Garden City\" for the poor. Division exist between the richest and the poorest, the pious and the atheists and even between lovers. One of the robbers was caught, one was found dead, and the third disappeared. The money was never found. Seven years later, the robber who was caught was released from jail. He immediately went to Miami, only to be found dead the next day. Now FBI agents Doug Bennet and Steve Forest have been called in to investigate the case while posing as Miami police officers.
